Sentencas: YSZ thin films were grown evaporating cubic and tetragonal phase ZrO2 stabilized by 8 Wt-% of Y2O3 (8% of YSZ) ceramic powders by using e-beam deposition technique.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: Operating technical parameters that influence thin film properties were studied.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The influence of substrate crystalline structure on growth of deposited YSZ thin film was analyzed there.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The YSZ thin films (1.5-2 mu m of thickness) were deposited on three different types of substrates: Al2O3, optical quartz (SiO2), and Alloy 600 (Fe-Ni-Cr).
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The dependence of substrate temperature, electron gun power, and phase of ceramic powder on thin film structure and surface morphology was investigated by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The substrate temperature was changed in the range of 20-600 degrees C (during the YSZ thin film deposition) and its influence on the crystallinity of deposited YSZ thin films was analyzed.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: It was found that electron gun power and substrate temperature has the influence on the crystallite size, and texture of YSZ thin films.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: Also, the substrate has no influence on the crystal orientation.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The crystallite size varied between 20 and 40 nm and increased linearly changing the substrate temperature.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The crystal phase of evaporated YSZ powder has the influence on the structure of the deposited YSZ thin films.
Titulo: YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique
YSZ thin films deposited by e-beam technique
